name: Russian Front
description: Experience grand strategy across the entire theatre of the Eastern Front; the military conflict that many consider to be the iconic attacker/defender scenario. Command massive armies in this fully 3D turn-based simulation of one of the largest military campaigns in history, playable as both Germans and Russians.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Just bought Decisive Campaigns: Barbarossa and it outclasses this game to a very high degree. I have only played this game for a short time and although simple to play it is too simple and too slow to be a real East Front game.
